CREATE TABLE ApplicationAccessLogs( UserID varchar (10) NOT NULL, AccessLogID varchar(10) NOT NULL, StaffID varchar(10), DateTime timestamp, LogDescription varchar(1000), FOREIGN KEY (UserID) REFERENCES USERS(UserID), PRIMARY KEY (AccessLogID) )

CREATE TABLE Users( UserID int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, LoginStatus boolean, StreetAddress varchar(15), UnitNumber integer, City varchar(15), State varchar(3), PostalCode integer, PhoneNumber varchar(10), PRIMARY KEY (UserID) )

CREATE TABLE Staff( UserID int NOT NULL, StaffID int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, FName varchar(20), LName varchar(20), PhoneNumber varchar(10), Email varchar (30), Password varchar(30), StreetAddress varchar(15), UnitNumber varchar(4), City varchar(15), State varchar(3), PostalCode varchar(4), Manager varchar(10), LoginStatus boolean, RegisterDate timestamp, ContractType varchar(20), PayHr integer, FOREIGN KEY (Manager) REFERENCES Staff(StaffID), PRIMARY KEY (Email) )
